basic_info.name: Dr. Ambedkar Global Law College Tirupati FAQs

faqs.question: How are the hostel facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.For students hailing from different cities, the hostel facilities of Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute are akin to none. With separate hostels for both, boys and girls, the students’ comfort is prioritized with a safe and secure environment. And, the food provided in the canteen of the hospital is nutritious along with being palatable at the same time.

faqs.question: Is there any scholarship available for students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, there is a scholarship available for students of the OBC category. College/university scholarships are also awarded to students for the next academic year if they’ve shown noteworthy results in the previous academic year. And, merit & national scholarships are awarded to the most brilliant students by the central and the state government.

faqs.question: How qualified is the faculty?
faqs.answer: Ans.Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute has proven to be a home for budding lawyers as students are schooled under the enlightened guidance by the best professors here. The faculty is a set of level headed individuals who go beyond the expectations of students when guiding them towards the right path. Some guest teachers also join the faculty, from time to time, to share their real-time experiences with the students.Read More:Dr Ambedkar Global Law College Tirupati Faculty

faqs.question: How is the fee structure?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure of Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute has proven to be extremely compliant with the convenience of students. With extremely affordable semesterly fees, there is also the advantage of no fines for late fees being taxed on students.

faqs.question: How is the exam schedule being followed?
faqs.answer: Ans.The exam schedule is strictly followed at Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute. Once the exam schedule is approved, exams are conducted in two shifts in a day, once in the morning and once in the noon.

Section.name: About Dr Ambedkar Global Law Institute
Section.description:
Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute, Tirupati was founded in 1991 and is a highly-ranked institution of law studies in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh. The institute offers both undergraduate and postgraduate programs along with integrated programs in the law domain.
Admission is based on the rank secured in the state-level LAWCET held by the Government of Telangana and CLAT, LSAT, AILET. The application process for admission is via offline mode.
The institute offers 3-year LLB and LLB (Honors) and 5-year BA-LLB, BBA-LLB, and B.Com-LLB coordinated programs. It offers a normal 5-year LLB program. Other than this, the foundation offers a 2-year LLM degree with specializations in Constitution and Legal Order (Branch I) and Criminal Law (Branch II).
Read More: Dr Ambedkar Global Law College Tirupati Fee Structure

The application charge is INR 800 for general, OBC and EWS classes, and INR 500 for SC, ST students.
